attributes.action: To implement  a speed limit for ambulances and police vehicles within towns and cities to 40 mph to protect families and childrens from potential accidents caused by these uncontrolled speeds.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Saving lives shouldn't jeopardise public lives. Common sense and logical. I have been living in the UK for 4 years now, and I feel everytime threatened by the police and emergency vehicles racing through densly populated small streets of towns and cities. I reckon that UK should adopt similar guidlines of many other countries, putting the lives of public and even these vehicles' staff first.

Thank you for your attention
